item.title: Matcha and spirulina latte
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup of plant-based milk 1 tsp of spirulina 2 tsp of matcha powder 1 tbsp of raw sugar (optional) Steps In a small pot combine 1 cup of plant-based milk, 1 tsp of spirulina, 2 tsp of matcha powder and 1 tbsp of raw sugar (if adding it) Cook on medium/high until it starts smoking while continuously whisking it, around 5 min. Turn off the heat and transfer to a mug, enjoy!
